thread.title: Chasing India’s E-Commerce Dream, on the Edge of My Seat
thread.title_full: Chasing India’s E-Commerce Dream, on the Edge of My Seat - WSJ

author: Sean McLain
title: Chasing India’s E-Commerce Dream, on the Edge of My Seat
text:
Click “buy” on any e-commerce site and the same thing happens: A package arrives on your doorstep a few days later—even in India.
I had several hours to contemplate how miraculous that is while squatting along a lonely stretch of Indian highway, staring at the blinking hazards of my broken-down taxi.
The driver said we hit a “boulder,” which was an exaggeration, but not much of one. I had just dozed off when the car lurched...
